alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Although particle physicists think they can probe the mysteries of creation by building mammoth accelerators costing billions of dollars to produce high speed impact of protons they do not have any theory giving insight into how those protons themselves are created. So they proceed in wild attempts to create other forms of matter thinking that will tell them how the universe itself was created."

- Harold Aspden, The Creation Of The Proton
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Trouble with Accelerators
